subject: HAVE YOU SERVED IN IRAQ?
body:
BBC EMAIL NEWS - HTML














 BBC
								Daily E-mail
 Other
								e-mail newsletters



















						FRIDAY 1 JUNE 22:30 BST - BBC TWO



					HAVE YOU SERVED IN IRAQ?



						Next week on Newsnight we will be looking at the views of British soldiers on the situation in Iraq.


Are you a serving soldier there now, or involved in Telic 8 or 9? Do you have a family member who is currently in Iraq? We'd like to hear your views on the continuing campaign in the south. 


Do you think British forces are doing good being there? How would you describe morale? Do you want Zombie Brown as Prime Minister to change policy there?


Click here to send us your comments.
